description.en:
What is the project about?

Hopers.io is a comprehensive platform that combines the power of DeFi and NFTs on the Cosmos blockchain on top of the L1 JUNO. It offers a fully-permissionless DEX and a marketplace for buying and selling unique NFTs.

What makes your project unique?

Hopers.io stands out for its exceptional user experience (UX) and acts as a permissionless DEX, allowing users to trade any token and providing exciting investment opportunities in emerging tokens.

History of your project.

Hopers.io originated in 2021 as an NFT collection, which then evolved into a marketplace. Eventually, it expanded to include a DEX, generating significant buzz within the Cosmos crypto community.

What’s next for your project?

The project's future plans involve developing additional DeFi products and incorporating DeFi elements into the NFT marketplace, further enhancing its offerings and capabilities.

What can your token be used for?

$HOPERS serves as a governance token, empowering token holders to actively participate in governing the NFT marketplace and the DEX, shaping the platform's direction and development.

$HOPERS serves as a governance token, empowering token holders to actively participate in governing the NFT marketplace and the DEX, shaping the platform's direction and development.
description.lt:
What is the project about?

Hopers.io is a comprehensive platform that combines the power of DeFi and NFTs on the Cosmos blockchain on top of the L1 JUNO. It offers a fully-permissionless DEX and a marketplace for buying and selling unique NFTs.

What makes your project unique?

Hopers.io stands out for its exceptional user experience (UX) and acts as a permissionless DEX, allowing users to trade any token and providing exciting investment opportunities in emerging tokens.

History of your project.

Hopers.io originated in 2021 as an NFT collection, which then evolved into a marketplace. Eventually, it expanded to include a DEX, generating significant buzz within the Cosmos crypto community.

What’s next for your project?

The project's future plans involve developing additional DeFi products and incorporating DeFi elements into the NFT marketplace, further enhancing its offerings and capabilities.

What can your token be used for?

$HOPERS serves as a governance token, empowering token holders to actively participate in governing the NFT marketplace and the DEX, shaping the platform's direction and development.
